Adding a "Four" loop to Clang Compiler

04 Aug 2020 Adding a "Four" loop to the clang compiler for fun and because, well, why not?

Python Roman Numeral Code Golf

03 Aug 2020 Some quick tips and tricks for code golfing Python.

Marchant "Silent Speed" Mechanical Calculator Repair and Operation.

26 May 2020 1942 Marchant ACR8M repair, teardown, functions, and basic operation.

Decrypting DJI Spark Drone Log Files

25 Jan 2020 DJI Spark Drones have a feature that allows them to transfer files to a computer. Some of these appear to be "black box" encrypted log files. By running and reversing the drone's firmware inside of QEMU, the encryption keys and methods can be determined.

Analyzing MacOS Malware that Executes a Payload in Memory

22 Jan 2020 This post was inspired by a Twitter post about a piece of MacOS malware created by the Lazarus Group. This malware has a special ability, it can load a Mach-O into memory and then execute it without it ever touching the disk.
